meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Boisterous</kanji> <kanji>sound</kanji> is when there's a lot of <vocabulary>noise</vocabulary> around you. It's the <vocabulary>din</vocabulary> of the crowd or environment.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
